name: 劉俊麟
objective:
最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之 VLSI 設計，使用 MSI 與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI 之設計與測試技巧，各種 CALD 軟體工具介紹。
1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic
2.VLSI realizations of combination logic
3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.
4.Components of sequential systems
5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.
schedule:
Week1: Review of Logic Design Fundamentals (1/3)
Week2: Review of Logic Design Fundamentals (2/3)
Week3: Review of Logic Design Fundamentals (3/3)
Week4: Introduction to Verilog (1/3)

Week6: Introduction to Verilog (3/3)
Week7: Verilog Simulation and Testbench (1/2)
Week8: Verilog Simulation and Testbench (2/2)
Week9: Midterm Examination
week10: Introduction to PLD
Week11: Design Examples (1/2)
Week12: Design Examples (2/2)
Week13: Design Examples (3/3)
Week14: SM Charts and Microprogramming (1/2)
Week15: SM Charts and Microprogramming (2/2)
Week16: Designing with FPGA (1/2)
Week17: Designing with FPGA (2/2)
Week18: Final Examination
